SETTINGS.AutoRollChecksHint: Automatically roll the attack roll or tool check for the item if it exists.
SETTINGS.AutoRollDamageHint: Automatically roll the first formula group for the item if it exists.
SETTINGS.AutoRollRolltableHint: Automatically roll the Rollable Table for the item if it exists.
SETTINGS.ShowDamageTotalHint: Whether or not to show the total result of all individual rolls in a combined damage card.
SETTINGS.GlobalHint: This setting sets the default setting for all players.
SETTINGS.LocalHint: This setting overrides the world default for this client only.
SETTINGS.ModifierAdvHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will roll a check or attack with advantage, or roll damage as critical damage.
SETTINGS.ModifierDisAdvHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will roll with disadvantage.
SETTINGS.ModifierShowRollDialogHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will show the roll dialog, rather than skipping it.
SETTINGS.RollDialogBehaviorHint: Choose whether to show or skip the core dnd5e roll dialog when no modifier keys are held.

FORMULA-GROUP.DialogHint: Configure formula groups and which formulae are included in each group.
FORMULA-GROUP.GroupsMustNotBeEmpty: You must have at least one formula assigned to a formula group.

AUTO-ROLL.OverrideFalse: Force Auto Roll OFF for this item
AUTO-ROLL.OverrideTrue: Force Auto Roll ON for this item
AUTO-ROLL.Default: Use the default Auto Roll setting
AUTO-ROLL.False: Auto Roll OFF for this item
AUTO-ROLL.True: Auto Roll ON for this item
